Reclaim your free time and boost your sa: Reclaim your free time and boost your sales by +300% by automating your process!
descr_recalm: Live Pro Shop enables your clients to place orders during your live sessions by simple commenting. Billing is automated. Forget about killing yourself doing it manually for hours afterwards

tips_1: If clients do not proceed to checkout on time, the order is not processed and the products are iimmediately available again for other users
tip_caption_2: Decide how long the cart remains valid
tips_2: Set an expiration time and maximixe customer impulse-buying
tips_3: Establish the amount users have to reach in order to qualify for free shipping
tips_4: And enable them to add more articles with no extra shipping costs until the shipping starts
tips_5: No more hours spent after an exhausting live to manually generate numerous invoices
tips_6: Avoid any risk of overselling and the problems that result from it
tips_7: Adapt yourself to different shipping and payment methods according to client needs
tips_8: Stop losing orders from ghost carts and assign them to the waiting list
place_order_descr: With Live Pro shop, a mere comment is enough for a client to place an order and live a great shopping experience
increase_sales_descr: With a sales system as intuitive as Live Pro Shop, it`s possible!
save_up_descr: An intense live with many sales involves hours of repitive administrative management. Automate the process and forget about those long hours.

dedicate_cap_descr: And the other 30% spent the whole time for themselves and their family
best_caption: Best of all, Live Pro Shop works with all your favorite sites!
best_descr: Live pro shop gathers the best partners to increase revenue and strengthen customer loyaulty through live video sales
you_to_client: You too, be like our clients

arrayOfObjects.title: Perfect tool for business owner that utilizes live streaming for retail sales
arrayOfObjects.text: This software has transformed how I do Live Sales. Live Pro Shop tracks the customers' comments so I don't have to and my customers LOVE it!

arrayOfObjects.title: It has completely revolutionized the way that we do are selling
arrayOfObjects.text: Live Pro Shop has saved me hours of work and headache. Now, everything is in the same place - upload products quickly, check customers purchase history, tracking my sales, inventory break down and so much more...

arrayOfObjects.title: It's all very simple to use!
arrayOfObjects.text: I love all the features of LiveProShop, but my favorite is that my customers have access and control to their cart. They can see what they've ordered.
